Sentencas: The shipping industry is trying to use new types of fuels to meet strict pollutant emission regulations and carbon emission reduction targets.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: Hydrogen is one of the options for alternative fuels used in marine applications.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) technology can be used for hydrogen production.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: When water and carbon dioxide are provided to SOECs, hydrogen and carbon monoxide are produced.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: The interconnector of SOECs plays a vital role in cell performance.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: In this study, a 3D mathematical model of cathode-supported planar SOECs is developed to investigate the effect of interconnector rib width on the co-electrolysis of water and carbon dioxide in the cell.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: The model validation is carried out by comparing the numerical results with experimental data in terms of a polarization curve.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: The rib width is varied from 0.2 mm to 0.8 mm with an interval of 0.1 mm.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: It is found that the cell voltage is decreased and then increased as the rib width increases.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: When the current density is 1 A/cm(2), the voltages of SOECs with rib widths of 0.2 mm, 0.6 mm, and 0.8 mm are 1.272 V, 1.213 V, and 1.221 V, respectively.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: This demonstrates that the best performance is provided by the SOEC with a rib width of 0.6 mm.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: In addition, the local transport processes of SOECs with different rib widths are presented and compared in detail.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide

Sentencas: This study can provide guidelines for the design of interconnectors of SOECs.
Titulo: A Parametric Study on the Interconnector of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells for Co-Electrolysis of Water and Carbon Dioxide
